Question: Which statements are true regarding the relationships and roles in the movie 'Vikram Vedha'?
Options:
A. Saif Ali Khan and Hrithik Roshan collaborated in the past.
B. Hrithik Roshan replaced Aamir Khan in the project.
C. Vikram and R. Madhavan have a relationship in the original movie.
D. Saif Ali Khan and R. Madhavan are siblings in the film.
Answer: A) Saif Ali Khan and Hrithik Roshan collaborated in the past., B) Hrithik Roshan replaced Aamir Khan in the project., C) Vikram and R. Madhavan have a relationship in the original movie.

Question: Which statements are true regarding the characters and actors in *Vikram Vedha*?
Options:
A. Hrithik Roshan plays the character Vedha in the film.
B. Aamir Khan was originally cast for the role of Vedha before Hrithik Roshan.
C. R. Madhavan portrays the character Vikram in the film.
D. The relationship between Vikram and Vedha is central to the plot.
Answer: A) Hrithik Roshan plays the character Vedha in the film., B) Aamir Khan was originally cast for the role of Vedha before Hrithik Roshan., C) R. Madhavan portrays the character Vikram in the film., D) The relationship between Vikram and Vedha is central to the plot.

Question: Which characters are associated with Hrithik Roshan's role in *Vikram Vedha*?
Options:
A. Rohit Saraf
B. Vedha
C. Vikram
D. All of the above
